org.passay

Class UsernameRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.passay.UsernameRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rule

    public class UsernameRule
extends Object
implements Rule
    Rule for determining if a password contains the username associated with that password.
    Author:
    Middleware Services
